FW One Page Summary Enron TAP Cc Steve As requested below is a one page fact sheet Please let me know if you would like additional information Tracy Ramsey Director Global Strategic Sourcing Cell Backgrounddoc

Atlanta Airport Evacuated Because of BreachJust fyi I am on top of this an will notify you if any employees need assistance Tracy Atlanta Airport Evacuated Because of Breach ATLANTA AP Authorities halted departing flights at Atlantas airport and evacuated people from the concourses Friday after a man ran through a security checkpoint and jumped on a terminal train The Federal Aviation Administration stopped all departures at Hartsfield Atlanta International Airport and planes in other cities going to Atlanta were told to remain on the ground FAA spokesman Christopher White said All the passengers and employees in the concourses were cleared and sent to the main baggage pickup area Some planes were allowed to land but none could take off White said Airport police were pursuing the man Its still unfolding Delta spokesman Peggy Estes saidIt was unclear when air traffic would restart at the airport At this point airlines are diverting their flights according to location of nearest city AIRPORT STATUS INFORMATION provided by the FAAs Air Traffic Control System Command Center The William B Hartsfield International Airport ATL Realtime Status The status information provided on this site indicates general airport conditions it is not flightspecific Check with your airline FAQAirlineLinksairlinelinkshtml to determine if your flight is affected Due to SECURITY there is a Traffic Management Program in effect for traffic arriving The William B Hartsfield International Airport Atlanta GA ATL To see if you may be affected select your departure airport and check Delays by Destination Delays by Destination No destinationspecific delays are being reported General Departure Delays Because a traffic management program is delaying some arriving flights departing flight schedules may be affected Check with your airline javascriptDisplayAirlineLinksPage to determine if your flight is affected

Atlanta Airport ReopenedHartsfield Atlanta International Airport Update November pm Three hours after up to travelers were evacuated from Hartsfield Atlanta International Airport police officials reopened concourses at the worlds busiest airport Officers blew whistles and issued orders on bullhorns about pm for employees to first return to the terminals The thousands of people who had flooded the street outside the airport were asked to make room first for wheelchair passengers to enter the airport Police indicated that employees would be allowed back into the terminals Police also said people in wheelchairs and the elderly would be allowed back into the concourse first The doors then opened for other passengers who were forced to go back through the long screening process in order to reach their terminals The US Department of Transportation ordered the evacuation of between to people at Hartsfield Atlanta International Airport Friday after a man rushed past a security checkpoint

Traveler Update Cc George Please see the attached list below which provides an update of Enron travelers affected by the crisis As you know our primary goal is to facilitate safe and timely travel Our agency partners continue answering requests x and scheduling flightsaccommodations My staff and Travel Agency in the Park will work through the weekend until we get our travelers returned to their destinations safely Please contact me if you have any questions or require additional information Tracy X Cell

Travel Links Cc email We may not want to have one thirdparty website communicated as it probably may not have all appropriate information the website may discontinue updates and would require additional communication to redirect employees attention I think we should recommend pushing people to our intranet site travelenroncom This allows us to maintain the links and information flow without maintaining the actual content Would this accomplish our goals The below information is already posted at travelenroncom Please review for your thoughts Thanks TR To help travelers and travel arrangers we have compiled a list of helpful links International Travel Warnings travelwarningshtml Maintained by US State Department Links to US Embassies linkshtml Maintained by US State Department Airport Status Realtime flyFAAindexhtml Maintained by FAA Industry News Updated Airline Operations Airport Operations Travel Tips Maintained by National Business Travel Association Weather Maintained by The Weather Channel Worldtime Server To find out what time it is anywhere in the world
